## Tender Description

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking a non-profit organization to provide treatment, accommodation, and support services for offenders at the Bruce Oake Recovery Centre in Winnipeg. The successful bidder must provide a comprehensive treatment program, residential services, and liaison services to facilitate the successful reintegration of offenders into the community.

The services will include:

* Treatment and support for addictions and mental health issues
* Residential services, monitoring, and general support
* Liaison services with local police forces, community agencies, and partners
* Ongoing support and monitoring of offenders to ensure their successful reintegration into the community

## Tender Requirements

* The Bruce Oake Recovery Centre must provide a treatment program and residential services to offenders who meet the admission criteria set by the CSC.
* The Centre must develop a selection process that includes a review of the CSC referral, an assessment against the admission criteria, and a written decision of acceptance or refusal.
* The Centre must provide ongoing support and monitoring of offenders to ensure their successful reintegration into the community.
* The Centre must provide liaison services with local police forces, community agencies, and partners.

## Expected Results

The successful bidder must promote the successful reintegration of offenders into the community by addressing their specific needs in a residential treatment environment.
